message: Let's make a deal Bob. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good deal for you in the first round!
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'll take a slight majority, and you still get a sizable chunk. This deal makes sense for both of us.
Bob, my turn! I'm feeling generous, so I'll take a bit less than last round.  $55 for me, $45 for you. Time is ticking, and this money is losing value fast for me!
